com.craigl.softsynth
Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
  com.craigl.softsynth.MusicPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SampleProviderIntfc
public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SampleProviderIntfc

This class plays simple tunes specified in terms of an array of Note objects.

A MusicPlayer object manipulates the oscillator frequency and sends
noteOn and noteOff events to both the associated VCA and VCF
as required to play the specified tune.

The timing for the tune is derived from the sample stream. See text for details.

Author:
craiglindley

Constructor Detail

MusicPlayer

public MusicPlayer(BasicOscillator osc,
                   VCA vca,
                   VCF vcf,
                   Note[] notes)
MusicPlayer Class Constructor

Creates and initializes a MusicPlayer instance.

Parameters:
osc - Reference to the oscillator instance used to play the tune
vca - Reference to the VCA that is controlling note sound durations; if any.
vcf - Reference to the VCF that is altering the tune's sound; if any.
notes - Array of Note objects containing the tune to play
Method Detail

setLoopCount

public void setLoopCount(int loopCount)
Set the number of times the tune plays before completing.

Parameters:
loopCount - Number of times to play the tune.

playSong

public void playSong()
Method called to play the tune.

This method can be called over and over to play the tune repeatedly.

getSamples

public int getSamples(byte[] buffer)
Normally components process the samples in the buffer they are passed
but here, only a count of the number of times this method has been called
is processed. The samples returned from this method are from the
the previous sample provider in the signal chain.

Specified by:
getSamples in interface SampleProviderIntfc
Parameters:
buffer - Buffer in which the samples are to be processed
Returns:
Count of number of bytes processed

setSampleProvider

public void setSampleProvider(SampleProviderIntfc provider)
Setup the provider of samples

Parameters:
provider - The provider of samples for this MusicPlayer
